name: Kill Switch (2018)
description:
With just one control, dragging your finger to move your ship from side to side to shoot down the enemy ships. Any mistake will result in instant death and resetting the game. With an awesome soundtrack you will soon be addicted and trying to beat your friends high score in this simple but fun game.

8 levels of increasing difficulty ranging from easy to insane makes this game easy to play but difficult to master.
